short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create stunning videos with SimplyMotion. No prior knowledge required - plan, record and share your message in no time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the free SimplyMotion Chrome Extension—your all-in-one video creation tool!

Effortlessly capture your screen, webcam, or both to create engaging product demos, tutorials, and more. Our powerful built-in editor allows you to bring all your recorded clips together into a professional video, complete with text overlays, transitions, background music, and so much more.

No exporting, downloading, or uploading hassles—your polished videos are ready to share instantly. Whether you’re a pro or just getting started, SimplyMotion makes it easy to create stunning videos right from your browser. Just hit “Record” and start impressing!
